org.sql: SELECT work_packages.* FROM work_packages WHERE work_packages.id IN (SELECT relations.to_id FROM relations WHERE relations.requires <> 0 AND relations.hierarchy = 0 AND relations.relates = 0 AND relations.duplicates = 0 AND relations.follows = 0 AND relations.blocks = 0 AND relations.includes = 0 AND hierarchy + relates + duplicates + follows + blocks + includes + requires = 1 AND relations.from_id = 532)

rewrites.sql: SELECT work_packages.* FROM work_packages WHERE work_packages.id IN (SELECT relations.to_id FROM relations WHERE relations.requires <> 0 AND relations.hierarchy = 0 AND relations.relates = 0 AND relations.duplicates = 0 AND relations.follows = 0 AND relations.blocks = 0 AND relations.includes = 0 AND hierarchy + relates + duplicates + follows + blocks + includes + requires = 1 AND relations.from_id = 532) LIMIT 1
